divs: Sighting DetailsI've seen several u.f.o's in my life. I'm not really a time-concious person, but there were a couple times when I think I may have been abducted. Just the other night, I woke suddenly and thought I heard a strange buzzing noise, then decided it must have been a dream. Then I noticed the compact florescent light bulb was glowing slightly, like they do after you shut one off or shine a light on it. I was disoreinted just enough that the glow from it seemed to be moving. It gave me the creeps, and I'm a country boy, not afraid of the dark. Several years ago, I was followed or chased by a light from the sky while driving, and seemed to lose part of my memory. I remember vividly looking in my mirror at the light in a certain area, then my next memory is driving the opposite direction in a different area. I had no idea what time it was, so I can't say if there was missing time or not. I'm writing to ask what it takes and how much it costs to be regressed so I can find out what's been going on. I'd appreciate any advice you can give.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St Maries
This sighting has never been favorited.
